changeSet.author: ntodorovic
changeSet.sql: create sequence company_seq; create table if not exists company ( id bigint not null constraint company_pkey primary key, address varchar(255), bank_account varchar(255), city varchar(255), county varchar(255), featured_image_url varchar(255), logo_url varchar(255), name varchar(255), tax_identifier varchar(255), website varchar(255), auth_id bigint constraint company_fk_on_auth references auth, company_category_id bigint constraint company_fk_on_company_category references company_category );
